Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?

Message: The user completes the submission of the form

Hi Taylor, I'm sorry to hear that your ad is still stuck in review. If your ad is pending due to it being a new account and not being verified, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Thanks for letting me know, Taylor. Since you've already provided the necessary information, I recommend reaching out to adsupport@newsbreak.com again to check on the status of your account review. Please mention that you have already submitted the required details and ask for an update on your ad review status.
